mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblmedicaltype (state , typeid , weight , joinid ,did,collectdate,collectid,bagcode,boxcode,hid,depidemic) VALUES (#{state}, #{typeId},#{weight},#{staffid},#{dcode},#{time},#{collect},#{bag},#{boxcode},#{hName},#{depidemic})

INSERT INTO tblmedicaltype (state , typeid , weight , joinid ,did,collectdate,collectid,bagcode,boxcode,hid,depidemic) VALUES
(#{item.state}, #{item.typeId},#{item.weight},#{item.staffid},#{item.dcode},#{item.time},#{item.collect},#{item.bag},#{item.boxcode},#{item.hName},#{item.depidemic})
